--- title: "`thinkr::peep()`: See intermediate stages of piped dfs" date: "6/1/23" categories: - dataframes - piping --- ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/setup_3d128d30258acd457e6aab6cf60de21a'} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true" code-summary="Setup"} library(tidyverse) library(thinkr) ``` ::: Insert `thinkr::peep(head)` into a `df` pipeline to print a few rows at a particular intermediate stage in the pipeline. Here it prints a few lines of the `df` before it gets summarized: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_1778331bcb7553dfdf28d087dd3f1977'} ```{.r .cell-code} palmerpenguins::penguins |> peep(head) |> group_by(species) |> # <1> summarize(across(where(is.numeric), \(x) mean(x, na.rm = TRUE))) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 6 × 8 species island bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm body_mass_g 1 Adelie Torgersen 39.1 18.7 181 3750 2 Adelie Torgersen 39.5 17.4 186 3800 3 Adelie Torgersen 40.3 18 195 3250 4 Adelie Torgersen NA NA NA NA 5 Adelie Torgersen 36.7 19.3 193 3450 6 Adelie Torgersen 39.3 20.6 190 3650 # ℹ 2 more variables: sex , year ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display}
|species | bill_length_mm| bill_depth_mm| flipper_length_mm| body_mass_g| year| |:---------|--------------:|-------------:|-----------------:|-----------:|--------:| |Adelie | 38.79139| 18.34636| 189.9536| 3700.662| 2008.013| |Chinstrap | 48.83382| 18.42059| 195.8235| 3733.088| 2007.971| |Gentoo | 47.50488| 14.98211| 217.1870| 5076.016| 2008.081|
::: ::: 1. How convenient that the base R pipe looks like a penguin. You can use multiple functions, like `head` and `tail` to see two views of the intermediate step; `verbose = TRUE` prints the functions used for these peeps: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_2e8d1b87658cd5c580318c491ad95d79'} ```{.r .cell-code} palmerpenguins::penguins |> peep(head, tail, verbose = TRUE) |> group_by(species) |> summarize(across(where(is.numeric), \(x) mean(x, na.rm = TRUE))) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` head(.) ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 6 × 8 species island bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm body_mass_g 1 Adelie Torgersen 39.1 18.7 181 3750 2 Adelie Torgersen 39.5 17.4 186 3800 3 Adelie Torgersen 40.3 18 195 3250 4 Adelie Torgersen NA NA NA NA 5 Adelie Torgersen 36.7 19.3 193 3450 6 Adelie Torgersen 39.3 20.6 190 3650 # ℹ 2 more variables: sex , year ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` tail(.) ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 6 × 8 species island bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm body_mass_g 1 Chinstrap Dream 45.7 17 195 3650 2 Chinstrap Dream 55.8 19.8 207 4000 3 Chinstrap Dream 43.5 18.1 202 3400 4 Chinstrap Dream 49.6 18.2 193 3775 5 Chinstrap Dream 50.8 19 210 4100 6 Chinstrap Dream 50.2 18.7 198 3775 # ℹ 2 more variables: sex , year ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display}
|species | bill_length_mm| bill_depth_mm| flipper_length_mm| body_mass_g| year| |:---------|--------------:|-------------:|-----------------:|-----------:|--------:| |Adelie | 38.79139| 18.34636| 189.9536| 3700.662| 2008.013| |Chinstrap | 48.83382| 18.42059| 195.8235| 3733.088| 2007.971| |Gentoo | 47.50488| 14.98211| 217.1870| 5076.016| 2008.081|
::: ::: And you can include arguments to functions inside `peep()` with dot syntax: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_01caf3d87a4f2579db8cd96ecc25b41b'} ```{.r .cell-code} palmerpenguins::penguins %>% peep(head(., n = 7)) |> group_by(species) |> summarize(across(where(is.numeric), \(x) mean(x, na.rm = TRUE))) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 7 × 8 species island bill_length_mm bill_depth_mm flipper_length_mm body_mass_g 1 Adelie Torgersen 39.1 18.7 181 3750 2 Adelie Torgersen 39.5 17.4 186 3800 3 Adelie Torgersen 40.3 18 195 3250 4 Adelie Torgersen NA NA NA NA 5 Adelie Torgersen 36.7 19.3 193 3450 6 Adelie Torgersen 39.3 20.6 190 3650 7 Adelie Torgersen 38.9 17.8 181 3625 # ℹ 2 more variables: sex , year ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display}
|species | bill_length_mm| bill_depth_mm| flipper_length_mm| body_mass_g| year| |:---------|--------------:|-------------:|-----------------:|-----------:|--------:| |Adelie | 38.79139| 18.34636| 189.9536| 3700.662| 2008.013| |Chinstrap | 48.83382| 18.42059| 195.8235| 3733.088| 2007.971| |Gentoo | 47.50488| 14.98211| 217.1870| 5076.016| 2008.081|
::: :::
